txt.en: The nervous goat seems slightly less nervous
Nervous animals can be found in the pen near Mossward's eastern gate.\n\nSeren has asked you to calm some of the nervous animals in Mossward.
Seren asks you to help soothe the animals.
The chicken seems no less anxious, but you tried your best
The cow is now only slightly perturbed instead of fully perturbed

'Wasn't that lovely? They seem more at ease already. I find that taking care of the critters is just as soothing for the critters as it is for the caretaker. Wouldn't you agree?\n\n'Next, I could use some help cleaning up their droppings.... Wait! Where are you going!?'
TBD\n'Just give some of the animals some pets. If you're gentle and kind, they'll take to you.'
'Just give some of the animals some pets. If you're gentle and kind, they'll take to you.'

'These poor creatures are still recovering from the shock of what happened the other day. We all are, really. They could use a little attention, but alas I cannot pet all the animals at once, but such attention often helps to calm their nerves.\n\n'Could you take a little time out of your day to reassure some of these critters?'
